name: Alpha Play Tester
description:
READ DESCRIPTION!

You are the FIRST PlayTester of this awesome game! But... the developers left the developer panel they used to test out levels! Your goal is to use the panel to your advantage, and "Cheat" your way through the level.

Arrow Keys to move

X to dash

M for menu

E for the Developer Panel

And other things are pretty self-explanatory

Sounds: Bfxr

Music: Soundtrap.com

Art/ Code: Me and Bbomb

Devlog will be uploaded to this channel: Fun Master Ed (My Channel)

HUGE Thanks to Bbomb! He had to leave in the beginning, but helped with the overall style and art of the game :)
